coordinates
Class WGS84

java.lang.Object
  coordinates.WGS84
public class WGS84
extends java.lang.Object

WGS84 coordinates. This is the standard used for GPS. This coordinates are used to express absolut origins to which cartesian coordinates can refer to.

Constructor Summary
